description: Mammut's true heritage: The retro design of the Heritage HS Hooded Jacket Men is based on the legendary Mammut Twin Jacket from the 1980s Haute Route collection. A stylish but fully featured jacket: detachable hood, ventilation zones, several pockets with zippers, individually adjustable. GORE-TEX® makes the jacket absolutely waterproof and breathable. Mammut Easy Combine makes it possible to pair the hard shell jacket with various insulated jackets and mid-layers. The Heritage HS Hooded Jacket Men - between function and retro style.
name: Mammut Heritage HS Hooded Jacket - Mens
